title: The Social Fiction

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: "Who I am"—the persona, the social fiction, the curated highlight reel you use to get through airports, dinner parties, and awkward text conversations.

scene_context: The Architect illustrates the performative nature of 'who'—showing how our identities are curated highlight reels, social fictions we deploy to navigate airports, dinner parties, and digital interactions.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
